data.text: @RodentWild @Kit_Yates_Maths Because I very rarely use the account. I’m not obsessed with Twitter. 😘

@Chris76254691 @Kit_Yates_Maths It doesn't matter Chris Bunchofnumbers with only 14 followers on a 5 year old account and a feed filled with pro-Russia and Covid denial content.

#Report #Block https://t.co/l1x1UiKdzB
@Kit_Yates_Maths Even people who measure by deaths some, is like – whether do they think Covid deaths come from?
@Kit_Yates_Maths Are they patients admitted because of covid or were they admitted for other procedures but just happened to test positive?
@Kit_Yates_Maths Nightingales are filling up for first time ever apparently
@mrsjlcox @Kit_Yates_Maths It is terrifying... The level of ignorance out there regarding covid is huge, even amongst our NHS staff.
@nadiast33789209 @Kit_Yates_Maths This is insane. And terrifying:( these are the people we are supposed to be able to trust (health professionals!)

@Kit_Yates_Maths Keep posting this info.  It's really helpful and in a strange way reassuring that someone it telling us what's really happening.

Many thanks
@Kit_Yates_Maths You’ve been cancelled , get over it
